name: Common Cold
symptoms: runny nose, sore throat, cough, sneezing, mild fever
description: Viral infection of the upper respiratory tract
precautions: Wash hands regularly, avoid close contact with sick people

name: Influenza
symptoms: high fever, body aches, fatigue, cough, headache
description: Viral infection affecting the respiratory system

name: Pneumonia
symptoms: cough with phlegm, fever, chills, difficulty breathing
description: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs

name: Dengue Fever
symptoms: high fever, severe headache, pain behind eyes, muscle and joint pain
precautions: Mosquito control, use of mosquito nets

name: Malaria
precautions: Mosquito nets, insect repellent, prophylactic medication

name: Eczema
symptoms: itchy, inflamed skin, redness, dry patches
description: Chronic skin condition causing itchy, inflamed skin

name: Acne
description: Skin condition when hair follicles are clogged with oil and dead skin
treatments: Topical treatments, oral medications, lifestyle changes

name: Psoriasis
symptoms: red patches, silvery scales, itching, burning
description: Autoimmune condition that speeds up skin cell growth
treatments: Topical treatments, light therapy, systemic medications

name: Diabetes
symptoms: increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, blurred vision
description: Chronic condition affecting how body processes blood sugar
precautions: Healthy diet, regular exercise, weight management

name: Hypertension
symptoms: headaches, shortness of breath, nosebleeds, dizziness
precautions: Low-salt diet, regular exercise, stress management

name: Anxiety
symptoms: excessive worry, restlessness, difficulty concentrating, irritability
description: Mental health disorder characterized by excessive anxiety

name: Depression
symptoms: persistent sadness, loss of interest, fatigue, changes in appetite
description: Mood disorder causing persistent sadness and loss of interest
precautions: Regular exercise, social support, healthy diet

name: Asthma
symptoms: wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, coughing
description: Chronic respiratory condition causing breathing difficulties

name: Bronchitis
symptoms: cough with mucus, fatigue, shortness of breath, slight fever
description: Inflammation of the lining of bronchial tubes
precautions: Avoid smoking, wash hands, get vaccinated
